Text: I forgot to state, there's nine cards in each image, and one final image of three cards. Making them easy to print.

Thanks for uploading these. I just picked up the Japanese version of Eye of Judgement, which (of course) means all the cards are in Japanese. Without a decent-quality English starter deck it would've been that much harder to get into the game and start to learn it.

I've also got all the cards from nextgenboards but would love some high-res, non-tagged versions of all the cards too.
